title: Enhancing Medical Practice Competencies: Analyzing the Effectiveness of ICT-Enhanced Mathematics Education and Developing Practical Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Students can distinguish and explain at least three positive and negative impacts of ICT tools on mathematics learning.
Students can analyze the current status of ICT utilization in educational settings and write a report using smartphone-based survey tools.
Students can develop ICT utilization strategies suitable for the characteristics of the mathematics curriculum and present them as project outcomes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
